name: project-07-nft-hardhat
description: This Project Demonstrates Three NFTs, Frist - The BasicNFT, Second - The RandomIpfsNFT, and Third - The DynamicSvgNFT, All Three NFTs and This Project is Powered By Hardhat. This Project contains Deploy Scripts for each NFT, Unit Test for each NFT, Minting NFT Scripts and scripts for local environment as well as for testnet & mainnet Development.
author: theirrationalone
